item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

sk8rdude461:

What do you mean “With a different interface”

Well this is an old topic lol. What I was trying to say is you know how RuneScape updated their chat dialogue box? Basically, use a different chat dialogue interface rather than the current one in 317s. But don’t worry about it now.

item.title: Npc Dialogue [PI]
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

So I added the latest npc dialogue, but now I can’t change the dialogue. Like when you click ‘Click here to continue’ it show the next dialogue, how would I do that with a different interface?

Here’s my sendNpcChat4 method:

private void sendNpcChat4(String s, String s1, String s2, String s3, int ChatNpc, String name) { c.getPA().sendFrame200(39112, 9847); c.getPA().sendFrame126(name, 39107); c.getPA().sendFrame126(s, 39108); c.getPA().sendFrame126(s1, 39109); c.getPA().sendFrame126(s2, 39110); c.getPA().sendFrame126(s3, 39111); c.getPA().sendFrame75(ChatNpc, 39112); c.getPA().sendFrame164(39100); }
I changed everything except the 9847.

Read full topic
